name: qft-view-crm
description: 房源带看CRM系统 - 全栈应用

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run backend:start" "npm run frontend:build && npm run frontend:preview"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.build:all: npm run backend:build && npm run frontend:build
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/dist backend/node_modules frontend/node_modules node_modules
scripts.db:reset: cd backend && npx prisma migrate reset --force && npx prisma db seed

author: QFT Team
